title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS Nissan Navara 2006 D40 2.5L Pre Filter Water Separator Kit Fuel Manager FM618DPK

content.rendered:
Finally we have a vehicle specific Fuel Filter / Water Separator Kit for:

Nissan Navara (2006 on) D40 2.5L
Non DPF & Non Thailand Built.
** ONLY For Manual Transmissions

This Filter unit is to be used as a Pre Filter to separate water & contaminates thus avoiding costly repairs due to poor fuel quality. This kit includes very detailed fitting instructions and everything you will need & even where to fit it !

Kit FM618DPK Contents :
• 1x Fuel Filtration Unit Fuel Manager
Made by Stanadyne in the USA !
(Filters down to 30 Microns !)
• Mounting Bolts, washers & Nyloc nuts.
• Spare 30 Micron Filter.
• 4 Mtr of 3/8″ Quality Fuel hose.
• Specially Designed Filter Mounting Bracket.
• 3/8″ Inch Straight Barb Fittings.
• Blanking Plugs.
• Hose Clamps
• Thread Paste Sealant (6ml Tube)
• 6mm Mounting Bolts.

Download PDF Info >

Install all fittings and plugs with the thread paste.
